summary: Argetlahm sword from Wild Arms 2 PS1 game.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][b]Argetlahm Sword Eng/Rus[/b][/color]

[color=#ffff00]Author[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures

[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]:
Skyrim

This mod adds Argetlahm sword from Wild Arms 2 PS1 game. You can find it under a watchtower near gates of Markarth. This sword have no enchantment and can be improved with a quicksilver ingot.

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***
